TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMailTransport implements class MailKit.IMailService, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Occurs when a message is successfully sent via the transport.
Docs.remarks: The event will be emitted each time a message is successfully sent.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Send (MimeKit.MimeMessage message, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Send(class MimeKit.MimeMessage message, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed

remarks.para: The sender address is determined by checking the following message headers (in order of precedence): Resent-Sender, Resent-From, Sender, and From.
If either the Resent-Sender or Resent-From addresses are present, the recipients are collected from the Resent-To, Resent-Cc, and Resent-Bcc headers, otherwise the To, Cc, and Bcc headers are used.
